description: This Dart file implements an authentication screen (`AuthScreen`) for a Flutter application, providing sign-in and registration functionality. It contains UI code and logic for handling user input, interacting with an authentication service, and updating application state with the authenticated user.

classes.name: AuthScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget responsible for user authentication interface, supporting sign-in and registration.

classes.name: _AuthScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the authentication form, user interactions, and communication with backend services for authentication.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the authentication process by either registering or signing in the user through AuthService, then updates application state with the authenticated user.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the authentication screen UI, including input fields, buttons, and error messages.
